# Cape of the Mountebank
## Overview
**Aura** moderate conjuration; **CL** 9th

**Slot** shoulders

**Price** 10,080 gp

**Weight** 1 lb.

**Description**

On command, this bright red and gold cape allows the wearer to use the magic of the *[[Dimension Door (Spell)|dimension door]]* spell once per day. When he disappears, he leaves behind a cloud of smoke, appearing in a similar fashion at his destination.

**Construction**

**Requirements** [[Craft Wondrous Item (Feat)|Craft Wondrous Item]], *[[Dimension Door (Spell)|dimension door]]*

**Cost** 5,400 gp

**Source:** PF Core Rulebook, pg. 505
